metadata.name: [rep,rep+] Celeste Mod
metadata.description:
A mod for The Binding of Isaac that adds Celeste features to the game.
What does this mod add?
--------------------------
New character : Madeline / Tainted Madeline
--------------------------
Items/Trinket : - Celeste! (Tier 4) - Dash! (Tier 2) - Twister (Trinket) - Stop! (an exclusive Tainted Madeline item that doesnâ€™t appear on pedestals)
--------------------------
Pickups : - The hearts have been replaced by Celeste hearts, the coins by strawberries and the keys by the Celeste chapter 3 key
--------------------------
SFX : - Some sound effects have been replaced, like the coin or the secret reveal SFX
--------------------------
Resprite & Changes : - There are some resprites like the big chest when you beat and important boss, and some mini details like using the strawberries in the donation machine instead of coins
--------------------------
